item.title: Weck
item.description: Weck produces a variety of canning and storage jars in Germany.

item.title: Bormioli Rocco
item.description: Bormioli Rocco is an Italian glassware manufacturer. They make a variety of glassware, including: tableware, canning and preserving, and storage jars.
